Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Austin and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Central, Madison, Austin and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.
